title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: The dynamic text content type is not affecting the display as expected.
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display content from a database field with three types of content (1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags, (2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and (3) Text with RTF tags, the dynamic text content type does not have the intended effect.
EB: The dynamic text content type should appropriately render the content based on its specified type, ensuring proper handling of HTML text, HTML fragments, and text with RTF tags.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a database field with content including HTML text within <html>...</html> tags, HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and text with RTF tags.
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the content from this field.
3. Observe that the dynamic text content type does not have the expected effect on rendering the different types of content.
